description: This CSS file manages themes (light and dark) for the user interface of a workout planner application, defining variables and styles for various components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container class for the application, styled with background color and text color based on theme variables.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo of the application, including its size and animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header component of the application, including background color, layout, and text styles.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, using theme variables to control color.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button that toggles themes, with positioning and hover effects.
